thread.title: North Charleston City 10
thread.title_full: Candidates for North Charleston City Council, District 10 - Post and Courier

author: postandcourier.com
title: North Charleston City 10
text:
Michael A. Brown Ã— Bernard Brown Did not respond
Michael A. Brown Age: 60
Residence: Accabee Community
Occupation: Retired, Instrument and Electrical Planner, BP Amoco
Education: DeVry Institute of Technology (Electronics Technology)
Political Experience: 8 years Councilman, City of North Charleston
Contact information: (843) 747-3531, (843) 509-7527, bmichaelchr@aol.com
 Community service work in my district, litter removal, youth training at church.
 My committed dedication to the communities that has been proven, the vision for development of communities very rich in asset understanding future industrial developments that are proposed and the time to allocate for the work.
 District 10 is faced with multiple issues and they must be addressed concurrent.
Community stabilization with port and rail development, housing, recreational facilities (green space), grocery store, public safety.
Anjene Davis Age: 39
Residence: Chicora/Cherokee
Occupation: Auditorium Coordinator-Burke High School
Education: Springfield College-MA Organizational Management
Political experience: Neighborhood President for the Chicora/Cherokee Neighborhood Association for 6 years.
Contact information: (843) 735-0077, ajdavis76@gmail.com , www.ajforNChas.com
 Reading, exercising, spending time with family and friends.
 I have a passion and commitment to improving the community and helping residents reach their fullest potential. I believe that I am a great communicator.
 To improve access to quality housing options, employment opportunities with livable wages, improved communication from city hall resulting in residents being more informed as to changes affecting them.
